title: High Ping until Reconnect.
body: I averaged 30-40 ping throughout all of my games this season. But starting on monday, my ping after connecting to a game is 150+. I just found out today that the only way to lower my ping again is to reconnect to my game, which will bring it down to a static 40ms. Is there any explanation or permanent fix to this?

replies.body:
It sounds like there could be issues along your route to our gameservers. This could be due to a few different reasons, but our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) does a great job at covering the most common fixes for this, so I really urge you to work through those steps.

If you've yet to resolve the issue after taking those steps, let me know.

Hey I followed all of the steps, and It worked fine for 1 game, but now my ping is back at the ~160 consistently.

There actually may be an issue along your network routing then. I'd like you to run a traceroute log during a time that you're experiencing the increased latency (you may need to use a custom match to check) using an app called [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/). After loading up the app, simply plug **104.160.131.1** into the host field, then start the trace. After 5 minutes has gone by, you can export the results as text and then paste them into a reply.

Let me know if you ran into any issues.

Did you capture this during an incident? It looks like some bursts of small packet loss is all the trace captured. It's possible that these bursts could have been exacerbated by your modem. Maybe give it a quick power cycle by unplugging it from power for 60 seconds, then run another trace while you're seeing symptoms again.
